description:
A second-year student in the mechanical department, who belongs to http://anidb.net/ch125789 [Earth House]. She loves mecha, and is very curious about http://anidb.net/ch124444 [Suletta]`s http://anidb.net/ch123016 [Gundam Aerial]. Nika has outstanding maintenance skills, and is proud of herself for customizing http://anidb.net/ch125788 [Chuchu`s Demi Trainer].
Source: Official page
name: Nika Nanaura
